1. The recount text is a text that....
A. Telling some funnies story.
B. Telling a story to entertain the readers.
C. Retells past events in the order the happened.
D. Tells many events that will be happen in the future.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

C. Retells past events in the order the happened.

Penjelasan:

Jawaban:

1. Andy

2. At 20 july 2019

3. 19 Years old

4. The names is Bubble and Squek

5. Andy's Hobby is music, reading and watching movies

Penjelasan:

1. Andi

2. 20 July 2019

3. 19 Years Old

4. Bubble And Squeak

5. Music

related_questions.question:
Buatlah kalimat berikut present perfect tensse 2. He (study) English for 3 years.    3.1 (live) in Kebumen for 15 years.

4.1 (smoke) since I was a child. 5. They (eat) it all.

6. We (work) for 5 hours.

8. We (submit) the assignment on time 9. He (do) it perfectly​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2. He has studied English for 3 years.

3. I have lived in Kebumen for 15 years.

4. I have smoked since I was a child.

5. They have eaten it all.

6. We have worked for 5 hours.

8. We have submitted the assignment on time.

9. He has done it perfectly.

Formula:

S + have or has + past participle.

S + have not (haven't) or has not (hasn't) + past participle

related_questions.question:
Change these sentences into simple past tense, baseed on the given Marka in bracket! (number 1 to 3)    1. my family (go) to the cinema last week ( -, ? )

2. the student (study) in the laboratory yesterday ( +, - )

3. she (go) to Bandung two days ago (+, -)

4. the girl was very happy to hear the good news
 ( - ) .......

5. Active voice : the clever student brings a dictionary in his bag
 passive voice :.........​

answers.answer:
1. (-) my family did not go to the cinema last week.

(?) Did my family go to the cinema last week ?

2. (+) the student studied in the laboratory yesterday.

(-) the student did not study in the laboratory yesterday.

3. (+) she went to Bandung two days ago.

(-) she did not go to Bandung two days ago.

4. (-)

5. Passive voice: a dictionary is brought by student in his bag.

cmiiw

Jawaban:

kamu sudah makan bahasa inggris nya adalah Have you eaten

Penjelasan:

semoga bermanfaat

A.is

B.are

C.am

A.are

B.is

C.was

D.am

A.Was

B.Am

C.Are

D.Is

6. Football ......... the most

favourite sport in earth. 

A.am

B.is

C.are

D.were

7. My brother and I......... actors for action movies. 

A.was

B.is

C.am

D.are

8............Mr. Bean so funny person ?

A.Is not

B.Are not

C.Am not

D.Were not​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1.C she is not

2.A.Is

3.C.Am

4.A.Are

5.C.Are

6.B.is

7.D.Are

8.A.Is not

Penjelasan:

I/YOU/THEY/WE :PAKAI ARE

HE/SHE/IT:PAKAI IS

Kalau lebih dari satu orang seperti no.7 pakai ARE

jika yg di tanyakan nama orang pakai IS

Jawaban:

1. C

2. A

3. C

4. A

5. C

6. B

7. D

8. A

Subject. To be

I. Am

You, We, They. Are

He, She, It. Is

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu :D

related_questions.question: We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
(went=past tense of go)
so “we went to the beach 2 weeks ago”
jangan lupa kalau weeknya lebih dari satu pakai “s” (weeks)
